mapper.select: SELECT mc.REPORT_ID AS reportId, m.MARKET_NO AS marketNo, m.MARKET_TITLE AS marketTitle, mc.REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, mc.REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, m.IS_HIDDEN AS isHidden FROM TB_MARKET_CNT mc JOIN TB_MARKET m ON mc.MARKET_NO = m.MARKET_NO ORDER BY mc.REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT R.REPORT_ID AS reportId, R.REPORT_REASON AS reportReason, R.REPORT_DATE AS reportDate, M.MARKET_NO AS marketNo, M.MARKET_TITLE AS marketTitle, M.MARKET_CONTENT AS marketContent, M.IS_HIDDEN AS isHidden, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MARKET_CNT WHERE MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO) AS totalReportCount FROM TB_MARKET_CNT R JOIN TB_MARKET M ON R.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO WHERE R.REPORT_ID = #{reportId}
